channel.title: Will I get banned because I lost internet connection to game?
channel.description: So I was an alive knight and I lost my internet connection for some reason and then my game crashed :frowning:, so I'm wondering will I get banned? I have never left a game unless I'm dead or my internet goes awful and I crash (I think this is the third time my internet breaks, will try to get a better one.)

item.title: Will I get banned because I lost internet connection to game?
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
yeh, you won’t. Internet isn’t something you can control. Like if your connection drops you’ll be fine

Read full topic

item.title: Will I get banned because I lost internet connection to game?

item.description:

item.title: Will I get banned because I lost internet connection to game?
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
from a single incident in a long string of games… nah not likely. If it happens on more than like 5% of the games you’ve played, then you might have to start worrying.

Read full topic
